item.title: Lesson 1 - Programming in Python
item.description:
Laying the Foundation for Data Analytics

This is your starting point for learning Python as a powerful tool for data analytics. Whether you are new to programming or already have some experience, this course and its lessons will help you understand how Python can assist in exploring and understanding data.

item.title: Lesson 2 - Variables and Data Types
item.description:
Building on Your Knowledge of Python Data Handling

In this lesson, we’ll learn how to store values and work with both numerical and text data in Python. Knowing how to manage numbers and strings sets the groundwork for more advanced tasks, including data analytics and machine learning models. Before starting, it’s best if you already know how to write basic Python code and perform simple arithmetic operations.

item.title: Lesson 3 - Lists and For Loops
item.description: This lesson introduces lists, indexing, slicing, and for loops in Python, and shows how to read and process a large dataset efficiently.

item.title: Installing Python on MacOS
item.description: Python is one of the most powerful programming languages, widely used in data science, machine learning, and big data analytics. Installing Python is essential for all programmers. As a novice programmer, you may wonder how to install or update Python on your Mac properly. Here, we’ll walk through the different ways of installing and updating Python on macOS.
